replies.body: You want a potato pun? Fry and stop me!
Now or Tater?

Also coming soon:

{{champion:105}} Phishing Attempt Fizz

{{champion:161}} Spyware Vel'Koz

And of course,

{{champion:32}} Sad Robot Amumu
{{champion:267}} Finding Nami
No no no... it'd be "Finding Teemo" {{champion:17}}
Why would anyone want to find Teemo?
LOL I killed a Teemo with a Braum that had 220 MR and 235 Armor added with my Stand Behind me that went in to the 260-290 range. IM SO NERDY
the only thing i can think of when i see {{champion:161}} is the Eye of Sauron
i want a D&D style beholder skin for him :(
We definitely need a beholder skin. And maybe a mindflayer skin for{{champion:38}}
As another D&D player my response to that is YES!!!

I have the same thing but except i see {{champion:161}} as **vel'kozby**.

Imagine him with a bill kosby head.

I love the idea of that Kozby sweater flailing all over the place! I'd like to throw my hat in for Jessica AlbAatrox {{champion:266}} . I mean LoL should be able to break gender barriers too (plus he's already wearing lipstick)!
What about Nyan Cat {{champion:107}} ? and {{champion:76}} ? And Bru{{champion:50}} ?
Seriously, I wanthat batman Swain.
I believe you meant to say Trojan Man Pantheon.

... That silly yellow glove... with a dick spear (covered of course) and a wrapper for the shield...

And upon landing his ult just yells "TROJAN MAN" like in the cheesy commercials...

And his joke is "like my spear? it's ribbed for your pleasure... and mine"
HAHAHA I read that entirely in Pantheon's voice, too. It's perfect.
What about {{champion:201}} Firewall Braum?
What can I say? Potato puns are simply appealing.
no need to be hash.
Protato have been upping their game for a while now. The Analyze Mode is soooo cool!
You should hire Protatomonster, they can make the Analyze Mode real, and up the spectating by 100%
Riot Protato
Friot Protato*

Riot please make this happen somehow. It will heavily increase the fun and use of spectating and make it overall a better way to see how you could have changed your play or what your team did good in that fight. It will also be a unique way to replay a match that I doubt any other game has.
I don't know about you guys, but when the slow-mo zoom happened, I got goosebumps and butterflies. Amazing editing.
This. Yes. The first time I saw it felt like when I first watched The Matrix in theaters.
^This.
Also, if you haven't watched that behind the scenes video for last month's video, you should. It's CRAAAAZY how much work they put into the analyze mode. Seriously talented.
That {{champion:51}}  Q doe

That was one of my favorite parts actually, but not for what you think.

{{champion:51}}   anticipated a flash across the turret to dodge her q and possibly buy enough time to heal up.

still pretty pointless, but I thought it was cool how quickly the player thought of possible scenarios.
This- I thought it was very thoughtful as well. For a split second though I was worried Cait had a Shen or something lol (proc ability for damage)
TheHawtPotato Approves
LOL <3
New game mode RITO, Hot Potato!
Hot Protato!*
Protato monster as a new champion please! Imagine the hype!

Q=Protato Bomb: Throw's a protato grenade with a delayed blast dealing magic and attack damage and slightly slowing targets hit for 2 seconds

W=Protato warcry:Passive:Every 3rd auto attack heals himself Active: Increases attack damage by 20 and attack speed for 4 seconds.

E=Protato dash:Dashes to target area dealing attack damage to enemies on the way. 

R=Protato Evolution: When activated  gains extra Armor and Mr. While activated a potato storm rages around you like Nasus ult except lightning in the shape of fries arcs off and hits enemies dealing magic damage. Enemies can get hit every 1.5 seconds.

Nah, Protato Monster should have...

Q - Protato Gun:  shoots a potato gun with an explode-on-hit effect, dealing physical damage to nearby enemies who are hit with chunks of potato

W - Hot Potato: Passive: Every 3rd attack burns targets, dealing magic damage over time.

E - All Fried Up:  Protato Monster splits himself into fries for 3 seconds, which hop and leave trails of salt on the ground behind them.  Enemies who walk in the salt will be slowed due to clogging arteries, and dealt physical damage.

R - Fully Loaded:  When activated gains bonus attack speed for 7 seconds, while basic attacks smack enemies with a strip of bacon, causing the passive effect of Hot Potato to double and apply to each attack.

Or...

W Cost: 25/40/55/70/85 Mana per Toggle. Toggle - Hot Potato: Passive ON: Every 3rd attack burns targets, dealing magic damage over time. Passive OFF: Every 3rd auto attack heals himself.

This way there is a difficult decision during a match, either to fall back to heal or try to poke the enemy. The Mana cost to balance and can be balanced further as higher, lower or by ratio.
{{champion:266}}
Cool one of them is Iranian
everything was fine ... but the voice ... its like a longggg dialog speaking in monotone and without breathing

Been following protato monster since before riot was, im glad to see them giving yet another part of the community a shout out its another example of the fact that no matter how many ppl you hire to do something no one ever tries harder and shows more passion than true fans.
 PS bring back summoner showcase
JumpInThePack FTW!!!!!!!!!
remember when playing a retard in a movie would get you a grammy? jumpinthepack is way past that.
Amazing.
